definitions.definition: a person or animal who is asleep or who sleeps in a specified way.
examples: he was a light sleeper, for long periods an insomniac

definitions.definition: a thing used for or connected with sleeping, in particular.
a sleeping car, or a berth in one.
one-piece coverall pajamas for a baby or small child.
a sofa or chair that converts into a bed.
a movie, book, play, etc., that achieves sudden unexpected success after initially attracting little attention, typically one that proves popular without much promotion or expenditure.
an antique whose true value goes unrecognized for some time.
a secret agent who remains inactive for a long period while establishing a secure position.
examples: noun: sleeper agent; plural noun: sleeper agents

definitions.definition: a stocky fish with mottled coloration that occurs widely in warm seas and fresh water.
